product_overview: A comprehensive Quality Management System designed to support manufacturing and production quality processes with modules covering authentication, KPI tracking, quality cost management, audit and complaint handling, supplier and internal quality control, deviation management, and more, supported by modern web technologies.
core_goals: Provide an integrated platform for quality management across production, supplier, and customer domains.
Enable efficient tracking and analysis of key performance indicators and quality-related costs.
Support comprehensive issue management including non-conformities, deviations, customer complaints, and audit findings.
Facilitate continuous improvement through Kaizen management and a polyvalence matrix for skill tracking.
Ensure secure access and role-based permissions for data integrity and compliance.
Deliver detailed reporting and PDF generation capabilities for decision support and documentation.
key_features: Authentication & Authorization with role-based access via Supabase Auth.
Dashboard & Analytics with KPI tracking and visual charts for system overview.
KPI Module to define, track, and analyze performance indicators with trend analysis.
Quality Cost Management for internal and external failure cost tracking.
Design Failure (DF) and 8D Problem Solving Management workflow.
Quarantine Management for handling material/product quarantine processes.
Internal Audit Management with planning, execution, finding tracking, and reporting.
Supplier Quality Management including evaluations, audits, and performance tracking.
Customer Complaints Management for comprehensive complaint lifecycle handling.
Deviation Management system for production and process deviation tracking and approvals.
Incoming Quality Control managing incoming materials, inspection plans, and risk stocks.
Equipment & Calibration Management including maintenance and calibration scheduling.
Produced Vehicles Management tracking vehicle quality and defect reports.
Document Management system supporting upload, versioning, and PDF viewing.
Training Management with personnel education and certification tracking.
Polyvalence Matrix for personnel competence and skill management.
Benchmark Management for industry comparison and performance evaluation.
WPS Management for welding procedure specifications and qualifications.
Kaizen Management supporting continuous improvement workflow.
Task Management for assignment and progress tracking of quality-related tasks.
Audit Log System recording user activities and changes for security auditing.
Settings & Configuration for cost, personnel, customer, and account management.
Reporting & PDF Generation supporting print-ready reports and dashboard exports.
Global Data Context and state management for consistent data flow across modules.
Reusable UI Components and utility functions supporting development consistency and UX.
user_flow_summary: Users authenticate via secure login and access modules based on roles and permissions.
Users view dashboards summarizing KPIs, audit statuses, complaints, and quality costs.
Users define and update KPIs and monitor trends through dedicated KPI module.
Users manage quality cost entries categorizing internal/external failures and prevention costs.
Users record non-conformities and follow 8D problem-solving steps to closure.
Users handle quarantine processes from registration to release of materials.
Audit teams plan, conduct and log internal audits, findings, and corrective actions.
Supplier managers perform supplier evaluations, audits and monitor supplier performance.
Customer service teams log complaints, analyze issues, manage communications and document actions.
Users report and approve production or process deviations including source integrations.
Incoming quality teams perform inspections and manage material quality control plans.
Maintenance teams manage equipment records, calibration history, and schedule maintenance.
Vehicle quality teams track produced vehicle inspections, defects and quality reports.
Users upload and organize quality documents with version control and PDF previews.
HR and training coordinators manage personnel training records, skill matrices and certifications.
Users perform benchmarking analyses using industry data for performance insights.
Welding teams manage WPS data including procedure and qualification records.
Improvement teams manage Kaizen suggestions, evaluations and implementation tracking.
Task managers assign tasks, update status and track completion within quality initiatives.
Security teams review audit logs to monitor user activities and changes for compliance.
Administrators configure system settings for costs, customers, personnel and access rights.
Users generate printable reports and export PDF documents from dashboard data.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication and role-based module access control.
Accurate calculation and display of KPIs and quality cost metrics on dashboards.
Complete coverage and traceability of 8D problem-solving steps and related non-conformities.
Comprehensive audit management including planning, execution, findings logging and reporting.
Accurate recording and follow-up of customer complaints through all lifecycle stages.
Effective deviation tracking with approval workflows and source record integration.
Reliable management of incoming inspections, control plans and risk stock alerts.
Maintenance of equipment and calibration records with correct scheduling and history tracking.
Functionality for uploading, version controlling and viewing quality documents as PDFs.
Complete training records linked to personnel data with valid certification tracking.
Robust benchmarking data and comparative analytics against industry standards.
Full WPS records management with correct procedure and qualification data.
Kaizen issue submission, evaluation and implementation closure workflow completion.
Task assignments reflect status changes and completion accurately in task boards.
Audit logs correctly capture user activity and critical system changes.
System settings changes persist correctly and reflect in respective modules.
Reports generate accurately with correct data and export without errors in PDF format.

features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: Kullanıcı kimlik doğrulama ve yetkilendirme sistemi. Supabase Auth ile giriş/çıkış, rol bazlı erişim kontrolü ve izin yönetimi.

features.name: Dashboard & Analytics
features.description: Ana gösterge paneli, istatistikler ve görsel grafikler. KPI takibi, kalite metrikleri ve genel sistem durumu gösterimi.

features.name: KPI Module
features.description: Anahtar Performans Göstergesi (KPI) tanımlama, takip ve analiz modülü. KPI hedefleri, gerçekleşme oranları ve trend analizleri.

features.name: Quality Cost Management
features.description: Kalitesizlik maliyetleri takibi. İç ve dış hata maliyetleri, önleme ve değerlendirme maliyetleri yönetimi.

features.name: DF & 8D Management
features.description: DF (Design Failure) ve 8D problem çözme metodolojisi yönetimi. Uygunsuzluk kayıtları, 8D adımları takibi ve kapatma işlemleri.

features.name: Quarantine Management
features.description: Karantina yönetimi modülü. Malzeme ve ürünlerin karantinaya alınması, takibi ve serbest bırakılması süreçleri.

features.name: Internal Audit Management
features.description: İç tetkik yönetimi. Denetim planlaması, soru bankası, denetim gerçekleştirme, bulgu yönetimi ve raporlama.

features.name: Supplier Quality Management
features.description: Tedarikçi kalite yönetimi ve denetim sistemi. Tedarikçi değerlendirmeleri, denetimler, uygunsuzluklar ve performans takibi.

features.name: Customer Complaints Management
features.description: Müşteri şikayetleri yönetim sistemi. Şikayet kaydı, analiz, aksiyon takibi, iletişim ve dokümantasyon.

features.name: Deviation Management
features.description: Sapma yönetimi sistemi. Üretim sapmaları, süreç sapmaları, onay süreçleri ve kaynak entegrasyonu.

features.name: Incoming Quality Control
features.description: Girdi kalite kontrol sistemi. Gelen malzeme kontrolü, kontrol planları, INKR kayıtları, risk stok takibi ve sac metal yönetimi.

features.name: Equipment & Calibration Management
features.description: Ekipman ve kalibrasyon yönetimi. Ekipman kayıtları, kalibrasyon takvimleri, atama geçmişi ve bakım planlaması.

features.name: Produced Vehicles Management
features.description: Kaliteye verilen araçlar yönetimi. Araç takibi, kalite kontrol kayıtları, kusur takibi ve raporlama.

features.name: Document Management
features.description: Doküman yönetim sistemi. Dosya yükleme, sürüm kontrolü, PDF görüntüleme ve doküman organizasyonu.

features.name: Training Management
features.description: Eğitim yönetimi modülü. Eğitim kayıtları, personel eğitim takibi, sertifika yönetimi ve polivalans entegrasyonu.

features.name: Polyvalence Matrix
features.description: Polivalans matrisi - personel yetkinlik yönetimi. Beceri haritası, yetkinlik seviyeleri, eğitim planlaması.

features.name: Benchmark Management
features.description: Benchmark yönetimi ve karşılaştırma sistemi. Sektör karşılaştırmaları, hedef belirleme ve performans analizi.

features.name: WPS Management
features.description: Welding Procedure Specification (WPS) yönetim sistemi. Kaynak prosedürleri ve kalifikasyonları.

features.name: Kaizen Management
features.description: İyileştirme (Kaizen) yönetim sistemi. Sürekli iyileştirme önerileri, değerlendirme ve uygulama takibi.

features.name: Task Management
features.description: Görev yönetimi sistemi. İş atama, görev takibi, önceliklendirme ve tamamlama kontrolü.

features.name: Audit Log System
features.description: Sistem denetim kayıtları. Kullanıcı aktiviteleri, değişiklik geçmişi ve güvenlik takibi.

features.name: Settings & Configuration
features.description: Sistem ayarları ve konfigürasyon yönetimi. Maliyet ayarları, hesap yönetimi, personel ve müşteri tanımları.

features.name: Reporting & PDF Generation
features.description: Rapor oluşturma ve PDF dönüştürme sistemi. Yazdırılabilir raporlar, dashboard raporları ve özel formatlar.

features.name: Data Context & State Management
features.description: Global veri yönetimi ve durum kontrolü. React Context ile merkezi veri akışı.

features.name: UI Components Library
features.description: Yeniden kullanılabilir UI bileşenleri. Butonlar, formlar, modal'lar, dropdown'lar ve diğer temel UI elemanları.

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Yardımcı fonksiyonlar ve araçlar. Tarih formatlama, durum yönetimi, validasyon ve genel helper'lar.
